mapper.select: SELECT addr1,contentid, facltnm, addr1 FROM gocampingapi ORDER BY contentid DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT animalcmgcl,contentid,facltnm, addr1, firstimageurl,mapx, mapy, tel, induty, managesttus, resvecl, homepage, intro, sbrscl, sigungunm,donm, gnrlsiteco, autositeco, glampsiteco, caravsiteco, indvdlcaravsiteco , sitedstnc, sitemg1width,sitemg2width,sitemg3width,sitemg1vrticl,sitemg2vrticl,sitemg3vrticl, sitemg1co,sitemg2co,sitemg3co,sitebottomcl1,sitebottomcl2,sitebottomcl3,sitebottomcl4,sitebottomcl5, toiletco, swrmco, wtrplco , lctcl FROM gocampingapi WHERE contentid = #{encurl} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC;

SELECT contentid,facltnm, addr1,addr2, firstimageurl, mapx, mapy, tel FROM gocampingapi WHERE facltnm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR donm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR sigungunm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR addr1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR addr2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC;

SELECT contentid,facltnm, addr1,addr2, firstimageurl, mapx, mapy, tel FROM gocampingapi WHERE donm ~ '^(인천시|충청남도|대전시).*' AND lctcl ~ '^(계곡|산|숲|도심).*' AND induty ~ '^(자동차야영장|일반야영장).*' AND sbrscl ~ '^(전기|무선인터넷).*' AND sitedstnc ~ '^(0|1|2|3|4|5|6).*' ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC;

SELECT COUNT(facltnm) as count FROM gocampingapi
WHERE donm = #{category}
SELECT addr1,contentid,firstimageurl,facltnm FROM gocampingapi WHERE sigungunm = #{category} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT donm FROM gocampingapi order by donm asc
SELECT DISTINCT sigungunm FROM gocampingapi WHERE donm = #{encurl} order by sigungunm asc

SELECT addr1,contentid,firstimageurl,facltnm FROM gocampingapi
ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC LIMIT 9 OFFSET CAST(#{npage} AS INTEGER) * 9
WHERE donm = #{donm} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC LIMIT 9 OFFSET CAST(#{npage} AS INTEGER) * 9
WHERE donm = #{donm} and sigungunm = #{category} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC LIMIT 9 OFFSET CAST(#{npage} AS INTEGER) * 9
SELECT addr1,contentid,firstimageurl,facltnm FROM gocampingapi ORDER BY (CASE WHEN firstimageurl = 'no data' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), firstimageurl DESC LIMIT 9 OFFSET 0;
SELECT COUNT(facltnm) as count, (COUNT(facltnm)/9) as countsix FROM gocampingapi
